## Damper.resetData() method

Reset damper values as described by the given DamperValues object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resetData(values: DamperValues): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  values | [DamperValues](./controls.dampervalues.md) | DamperValues object to reset the damper to |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
